name: Angulary
description:
This is a small puzzle game made for ScoreSpace Jam #12. In this game you'll need to combine shapes together to create a large shape to complete the puzzle. Using different shapes will grant a higher score.

Score Calculator:
Level Complete = 5pts
Every Shape Trio = 5pts
Ever Remaining Shape = 1pt

Controls:
Click and drag the shapes onto the puzzle.
Right click while dragging to rotate the triangles.
Click on an already placed shape to remove it.

This is my first time making a puzzle game, and formatting it for mobile. It kind of works on mobile right now but it's not optimized.  I'll be adding a better mobile version in the future, as well as adding more puzzles and more cosmetic upgrades
